18
19#include "BarcodeFormat.h"
20
21#include <vector>
22#include <string>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25
26/**
27 * @brief The Binarizer enum
28 *
29 * Specify which algorithm to use for the grayscale to binary transformation.
30 * The difference is how to get to a threshold value T which results in a bit
31 * value R = L <= T.
32 */
33enum class Binarizer : unsigned char // needs to unsigned for the bitfield below to work, uint8_t fails as well
34{
35 LocalAverage, ///< T = average of neighboring pixels for 2D and GlobalHistogram for 1D (HybridBinarizer)
36 GlobalHistogram, ///< T = valley between the 2 largest peaks in the histogram (per line in 1D case)
37 FixedThreshold, ///< T = 127
38 BoolCast, ///< T = 0, fastest possible
39};
40
41class DecodeHints
42{
43 bool _tryHarder : 1;
44 bool _tryRotate : 1;
45 bool _isPure : 1;
46 bool _tryCode39ExtendedMode : 1;
47 bool _assumeCode39CheckDigit : 1;
48 bool _assumeGS1 : 1;
49 bool _returnCodabarStartEnd : 1;
50 Binarizer _binarizer : 2;
51
52 BarcodeFormats _formats = BarcodeFormat::INVALID;
53 std::string _characterSet;
54 std::vector<int> _allowedLengths;
55 std::vector<int> _allowedEanExtensions;
56
57public:
58 // bitfields don't get default initialized to 0.
59 DecodeHints()
60 : _tryHarder(0), _tryRotate(0), _isPure(0), _tryCode39ExtendedMode(0), _assumeCode39CheckDigit(0),
61 _assumeGS1(0), _returnCodabarStartEnd(0), _binarizer(Binarizer::LocalAverage)
62 {}
63
64#define ZX_PROPERTY(TYPE, GETTER, SETTER) \
65 inline TYPE GETTER() const noexcept { return _##GETTER; } \
66 inline DecodeHints& SETTER(TYPE v) { return _##GETTER = std::move(v), *this; }
67
68 /// Specify a set of BarcodeFormats that should be searched for, the default is all supported formats.
69 ZX_PROPERTY(BarcodeFormats, formats, setFormats)
70
71 /// Spend more time to try to find a barcode; optimize for accuracy, not speed.
72 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, tryHarder, setTryHarder)
73
74 /// Also try detecting code in 90, 180 and 270 degree rotated images.
75 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, tryRotate, setTryRotate)
76
77 /// Binarizer to use internally when using the ReadBarcode function
78 ZX_PROPERTY(Binarizer, binarizer, setBinarizer)
79
80 /// Set to true if the input contains nothing but a perfectly aligned barcode (generated image)
81 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, isPure, setIsPure)
82
83 /// Specifies what character encoding to use when decoding, where applicable.
84 ZX_PROPERTY(std::string, characterSet, setCharacterSet)
85
86 /// Allowed lengths of encoded data -- reject anything else..
87 ZX_PROPERTY(std::vector<int>, allowedLengths, setAllowedLengths)
88
89 /// If true, the Code-39 reader will try to read extended mode.
90 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, tryCode39ExtendedMode, setTryCode39ExtendedMode)
91
92 /// Assume Code-39 codes employ a check digit.
93 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, assumeCode39CheckDigit, setAssumeCode39CheckDigit)
94
95 /**
96 * Assume the barcode is being processed as a GS1 barcode, and modify behavior as needed.
97 * For example this affects FNC1 handling for Code 128 (aka GS1-128).
98 */
99 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, assumeGS1, setAssumeGS1)
100
101 /**
102 * If true, return the start and end digits in a Codabar barcode instead of stripping them. They
103 * are alpha, whereas the rest are numeric. By default, they are stripped, but this causes them
104 * to not be.
105 */
106 ZX_PROPERTY(bool, returnCodabarStartEnd, setReturnCodabarStartEnd)
107
108 /**
109 * Allowed extension lengths for EAN or UPC barcodes. Other formats will ignore this.
110 * Maps to an {@code int[]} of the allowed extension lengths, for example [2], [5], or [2, 5].
111 * If it is optional to have an extension, do not set this hint. If this is set,
112 * and a UPC or EAN barcode is found but an extension is not, then no result will be returned
113 * at all.
114 */
115 ZX_PROPERTY(std::vector<int>, allowedEanExtensions, setAllowedEanExtensions)
116
117#undef ZX_PROPERTY
118
119 bool hasFormat(BarcodeFormat f) const noexcept { return _formats.testFlag(f); }
120 bool hasNoFormat() const noexcept { return _formats.testFlag(BarcodeFormat::INVALID); }
121
122 [[deprecated]] DecodeHints& setPossibleFormats(const std::vector<BarcodeFormat>& formats)
123 {
124 _formats.clear();
125 for (auto f : formats)
126 _formats |= f;
127 return *this;
128 }
129};
130
131} // ZXing
132
